Special course «Survive at any cost»

Survive
At any cost

  • fri
  • sat
  • sun

3 days from morning to evening

Take a chance

What awaits you

  • Special knowledge

    In 3 days of the special course, you will receive knowledge taught by the military, climbers, rescuers

  • Special skills

    3 days in the forest, without tents, lighters or any other gadgets that would make life easier

  • Extreme

    Simulated extreme situations as close to reality as possible. You will have to rescue drowning people from the water, set off on a rope along sheer cliffs, get water, live in huts and dugouts

  • Constant stress

    Participants will have to overcome themselves to act in a stressful environment, to put into practice the knowledge gained earlier

What our special course gives

  1. Basic knowledge

    You will learn to prevent and prevent a person from getting into dangerous situations in nature and in the city

  2. Essential skills

    Get not only all the basic knowledge, but also skills that can save life and health, both your own and your family, loved ones and people around

What will not be

  • No boredom!

    There will be no boring and tedious theory. The course consists of 80% practice and only 20% theory!

  • No bacchanalias!

    No songs by the campfire and alco hikes. Only hardcore !

You'll find out

  • If you get lost

    What to do if you got lost and was left alone in the forest, how not to die of hunger and cold, make yourself a lodging for the night, make a fire without matches.

  • If you met wild animals

    How to behave in an extreme situation when meeting forest animals, even if “that kitty there” looks so peaceful.

  • If you need first aid

    You will learn what to do if a person becomes ill, how to provide self-help, how to get the victim out of the affected area.

  • If you find yourself in the water

    How to save a drowning man. How not to freeze and dry clothes. How to send an SOS signal.

  • If danger threatens

    You will learn working algorithms of actions in various emergency situations

The course also includes a block on city safety

  1. How to proceed during a fire?
  2. Automotive safety unit.
  3. Popular unrest, crush, terrorist attacks.
  4. Technogenic and natural disasters.
  5. What should be in an EDC kit.

You will gain

  • Master more than a dozen knots
  • You will play the role of a victim and rescuer
  • Spend the night in a guerrilla hideout
  • Try yourself in the role of Leonardo DiCaprio in the film "Survivor"
  • You will get a sea of adrenaline, but most importantly - an invaluable experience that will stay with you for life

Road map

  • Military mountaineering with a minimum set of equipment
  • Tactical medicine
  • Making a fire without matches
  • Building shelters, long-term and short-term
  • Equipment block
  • Emergency rescue operations
  • First aid
  • Methods for Warming and Drying Clothes
  • Search and rescue operations

Sign up and Take a chance
